document_data.name: Mhairdren Phull
document_data.mainbody:
'''Mhairdren Phull''' was the patriarch of House [[Phull]] of [[Waterdeep]].

Around [[1440 DR]], Lord Phull purchased a title of nobility from the impoverished original Phulls. Shortly after the new Phulls moved into the family mansion, Mhairdren's second son [[Blakrho Phull|Blakrho]] murdered his older brother and blamed the crime on a younger brother. The [[City Guard (Waterdeep)|City Guard]] initially believed Blakrho but Mhairdren caught his son beating his mother and was thrown down a flight of stairs and gravely injured. Blakrho fled Waterdeep with most of Mhairdren's [[currency|coin]] and his best [[wine]].[[Ed Greenwood]]. "Eye on the Realms:  The Wild Lords." ''[[Dungeon magazine|Dungeon]] '' #190. Renton, WA: Wizards of the Coast, May, 2011.
